General Services came to solve some of these problems to provide unemployment youth the right opportunity to work from home, work in part-time jobs, or hour-to-hour jobs.
General Services is an Android mobile app built with Kotlin and supported with Google services working on devices with android 6 or higher.
General services provide a user-friendly app where users can view jobs and apply to them through their mobile phone, and keep everything in place general also provide a fully functional admin dashboard and admin panel to manage users, Jobs posted, and user behavior.
